install.title: Install Nirvati
install.description: Nirvati can be installed on various hardware platforms. Choose your preferred installation method below.
install.existing-linux: Or, Install on an existing Linux system
install.settings-hint: If you're not sure about this setting, you can leave it at its default value, it's suitable for most users.

storage.title: Storage
storage.description: Choose the storage layer for your Nirvati installation. The storage layer manages how data is stored and accessed in your Nirvati environment.

localpath.label: Simple Storage Layer
localpath.description: Use the local path provisioner for simple storage management. This has less resource usage but does not support backups, snapshots, multiple devices, or size limits.

longhorn.label: Advanced Storage Layer
longhorn.description: Use Longhorn for advanced storage management with support for backups, snapshots, and more.

storage.disclaimer: Longhorn is a trademark of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Nirvati is not affiliated with or endorsed by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation.

base.title: Base system
base.description: Choose the base system for your Nirvati installation. The base system provides essential services and applications for your Nirvati environment.

micro.label: Nirvati Micro
micro.description: An absolutely minimal base system with only the most essential services and applications, suitable for single-server deployments.

k3s.label: K3s
k3s.description: A lightweight Kubernetes distribution for single-server deployments.

rke2.label: RKE2
rke2.description: An optimized Kubernetes distribution for multi-server deployments.

base.disclaimer: RKE2 and the RKE2 logo are designed and owned by SUSE LLC. K3s and the K3s logo are registered trademarks of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Nirvati is not affiliated with or endorsed by SUSE LLC or the Cloud Native Computing Foundation.

disk.title: Disk
disk.description: Select whether to store data on the same disk Nirvati is installed on or on a separate disk.

internal.label: Same disk
internal.description: Store data on the same disk as the Nirvati image you'll download.

external.label: Separate disk
external.description: Store data on a separate disk.

hardware.title: Choose your hardware platform
hardware.description: Select the hardware platform you want to install Nirvati on.

download.title: Download Nirvati
download.description: Download the Nirvati image for your chosen hardware platform. The image is a pre-configured system that can be written to a USB stick or SD card.
download.final-note: These images are not designed to install Nirvati. Instead, they are directly bootable images that can be written to a USB stick or SD card.
